# GenerateAttentionBasedSaliencyImageRequest

**Structure**

An object that produces a heat map that identifies the parts of an image most likely to draw attention.

## Declaration

```swift
struct GenerateAttentionBasedSaliencyImageRequest
```

## Overview

The request returns the resulting heat map and object data in an instance of [doc://Vision/documentation/Vision/SaliencyImageObservation].

## Creating a request

- **init(_:)**: Creates an attention saliency image request.

## Getting the revision

- **revision**: The algorithm or implementation the request uses.
- **supportedRevisions**: The collection of revisions the request supports.
- **GenerateAttentionBasedSaliencyImageRequest.Revision**: A type that describes the algorithm or implementation that the request performs.

## Performing a request

- **perform(on:orientation:)**: Performs the request on an image URL and produces observations.
- **perform(on:orientation:)**: Performs the request on image data and produces observations.
- **perform(on:orientation:)**: Performs the request on a Core Graphics image and produces observations.
- **perform(on:orientation:)**: Performs the request on a pixel buffer and produces observations.
- **perform(on:orientation:)**: Performs the request on a Core Media buffer and produces observations.
- **perform(on:orientation:)**: Performs the request on a Core Image image and produces observations.
- **SaliencyImageObservation**: An observation that contains a grayscale heat map of important areas across an image.

## Saliency analysis

- **GenerateObjectnessBasedSaliencyImageRequest**: A request that generates a heat map that identifies the parts of an image most likely to represent objects.

## Conforms To

- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- ImageProcessingRequest
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
- VisionRequest
